title: Denver the last dinosaur. 2. Big top Denver
brief_description: Denver and the kids make friends with a circus owner’s son and help him liven up a lack-lustre show with bicycle and skateboard stunts. The updated circus is a tremendous success and Baxter’s Big Top is saved from financial ruin by Denver and his friends.
